For everyone that hasn't got it to work, here's how to do it:
1. Go to the download location and click 'CD1'.
2. Unrar the archive twk-bw2a.rar.
3. It should now've been unzipped into the folder twk-bw2a.
4. Repeat this step for each CD.
5. The folders with the unzipped files will be named twk-bw2a (CD1), twk-bw2b (CD2), twk-bw2c (CD3) and twk-bw2d (CD4).
6. For CD1, mount the file with the .mds-extension twk-bw2a.
7. Open the virtual drive and run setup.exe.
8. When installing, enter one of the serial numbers from here.
9. When prompted for CD2, mount the .cue file in twk-bw2b. For CD3, mount the .cue, and same for CD4.
10. When installation is complete. Run the patch (and tiger unlocker if you want).
11. Mount CD1 and start the game.
